attributes.action: Protect Non Muslims in Iraq by setting up  Safe Haven Areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister non muslim people are being forced to flee Iraq.
Many are having to give all the money and goods they have to try staying alive.
Yesterday sunday the 3rd of June 2007, a Chaldeen Priest and 3 others had been shot dead, after attending a church service in the morning until 7.30pm so frightened are these people to take away the bodies.
Families suffer terribly, wives, daughters and children are raped, some killed afterwards to terrorise the people some husbands forced to watch then tortured and killed afterwards, simply for being Non Muslims.
Safe Havens are being set up for Kurds,shia"s and sunni Moslems , why not for Chriastians and others whose ancesters have lived for thousands of years in Iraq.
